app.name: FB Alpha 2012 CPS-3
app.author: R-Sam based on RetroArch
app.long_description:
- Standalone APP for CPS-3 games. - Based on a snapshot of the FB Alpha codebase from 2012. - Compatible with FB Alpha v0.2.97.29 ROM sets.
Wii Channel : sd:/wad/fbalpha2012_cps3 Website : https://github.com/R-Sam-1980/cps3
